The <Wrangler Riggs Workwear Men's Ranger Pant> (B09KF5H1JK) priced at $49.99 is designed with features like triple-needle stitching and added reinforcement in high-wear areas, making it highly durable. The Room2Move Fit provides improved range of motion, ensuring comfort during physical activities. While the price is slightly above your expected range, the quality and durability of this pant justify the investment for long-term use.
